pageProps.title: The Power of the Placebo Effect: Understanding How Your Beliefs Affect Medications and Supplements
pageProps.metaDesc:
Have you ever wondered why you sometimes feel better after taking a medication or supplement that doesn’t actually have any therapeutic effect? This phenomenon is known as the placebo effect, and it is a powerful example of the mind-body connection. 

In this blog post, we will explore the placebo effect, how it works, and what it means for the medications and supplements you take.
